Articles.Content:
![oKxIXvX.png](http://i.imgur.com/oKxIXvX.png)
**The Kerbolar Program**

A detailed set of missions set out to explore Kerbin from space which will then

carry onto the Explorer and Endurance Program's. these missions will start off 

with unmanned probes and move onto manned missions. Multiple chapters will 

most likely be the case.
